title: We Must Remain the Wildhearted Outsiders (2014)
description:
We Must Remain the Wildhearted Outsiders
Drama - 9 September 2014 (USA) 

From IMDB (tt2429348): 
A young lesbian couple creates a mail-order business selling adult VHS tapes and Polaroids as a means to escape their oppressive Baptist town in the Ozark Mountains of Missouri.
Director: Chase Lisbon
Writer: Chase Lisbon
Stars: Amanda Pemberton, Lauren W.K., Mosh

---

From the uploader: 
This is a downsample from the DVDRip torrent 77764b0978c0e195b1ef6d8ac6a3d798ebbca5ec
The original film was done by be refilming onto Betamax and back, so the graininess is all intentional from the director -- I found no quality loss from the downsample.

This is probably the best avant-garde film of 2014. It tells a powerful and disturbing story that grips you from the beginning without a single spoken word. If you get aroused, and you almost certainly will, it will make you feel very dirty for doing so. 

Chapters 11, 12, and 20 (0:56-1:05 & 1:35-E) have long stretches of flashing frames and should not be viewed by those with photosensitive epilepsy.
